MainData.name: Holiday Inn Mumbai Internationl
MainData.about: Situated just 2km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, the Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport features a regular airport shuttle bus and free parking.Contemporary rooms each boast satellite television, iPod docks, a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can upgrade their room to a suite to benefit from extended living space and club lounge access.

MainData.name: FabHotel Plaza Inn Andheri East
MainData.about: FabHotel Atlas Plaza Andheri East is suitably located on Old Nagardas Road near Chinai College.Many corporate hubs and offices like Akruti Trade Centre, Times Square, SEEPZ, The Crescent Business Park, Excom House, Hyde Park, Mirchandani Business Park, Akruti Orchid Park, Logitech Park, Millenium Plaza, Ansa Industrial Estate, and Prime Corporate Park are located a few minutes away.

MainData.name: Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai
MainData.about: Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai International Airport is an upscale hotel thatâs only three miles from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport.The air-conditioned rooms feature an ensuite with free toiletries, bathrobe, slippers and a hair dryer. Turndown service and daily housekeeping are standard as is a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities, minibar, and free bottled water. An in-room safe, phone, paid Wi-Fi, free newspaper, desk, and ironing set round off the room amenities.The hotel offers business and leisure guests a 24-hour front desk, 24-hour business centre, tour assistance, limo service, and dry cleaning and laundry facilities. For added convenience luggage storage, conference space, full spa with pool and fitness centre, and limited free parking are also offered.

MainData.name: Hotel Pride Plaza Aerocity
MainData.about: Set in New Delhi, 2.8 km from Delhi International Airport, Pride Plaza Hotel, Aerocity New Delhi boasts an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness center and spa center. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Services like laundry and dry cleaning are provided. A well-equipped meeting and banqueting space is available. The hotel also offers car hire. Free private parking is available on site.

MainData.name: Lemon Tree Premier Delhi Airport
MainData.about: Ideally situated for corporate, layover and leisure travellers, Lemon Tree Premier Delhi Airport provides comfortable accommodation matched with modern amenities and excellent customer service.The rooms at this 4-star property are equipped with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV, DVD player, work desk, in-room safe, tea/coffee maker, plush bedding and en suite bathroom.Guests can head to the outdoor pool for a swimming session, gymnasium for their daily workout or spa for rejuvenating massages. Lemon Tree Premier Delhi Airport has business centre and meeting space for corporate and social gatherings. 24-hour reception, tour desk, currency exchange, free Wi-Fi and parking are also offered.At Citrus CafÃ©, guests can indulge in lip-smacking Indian and International dishes. Authentic Pan-Asian cuisine is served at Republic of Noodles. Slounge is the place for appetisers and beverages while enjoying pool, playstation and music.

MainData.name: Treebo Tryst Eden Residency
MainData.about: Situated just 2km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, the Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport features a regular airport shuttle bus and free parking.Contemporary rooms each boast satellite television, iPod docks, a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can upgrade their room to a suite to benefit from extended living space and club lounge access.

MainData.name: Shangri-La's - Eros, New Delhi
MainData.about: Shangri-Laâs - Eros Hotel, New Delhi presents new age luxury in the heart of Delhi, for the modern travellers. With the recent refurbishment, the guestrooms and suites have been accentuated with luxurious amenities and a chic and classy ambience in hues of silver, dove grey and muted beige colors for a splendid, relaxing experience. The timeless architecture, legendry hospitality, award-winning cuisine and signature spa treatments combines to offer the world-class Shangri-La experience.The revamp unveils the spectacular Horizon Club Lounge located on the 19th floor of the hotel, offering views of the bustling New Delhi and the most iconic landmarks of the city, including India Gate, Lotus Temple and Jantar Mantar to leave you transfixed. The best in the city, Horizon Club Lounge at Shangri-Laâs - Eros Hotel, New Delhi is a soothing, contemporary space for the avid traveller.
